scrollContent.title2: AN AUDIENCE IN SEARCH OF AUTHENTICITY
scrollContent.title3: THE MORE INVOLVED AN INFLUENCER IS, THE MORE ENGAGED WILL BE HIS SUBSCRIBERS

horizontalDisplay1.text1: The days of unboxings and obvious product placements are over.
horizontalDisplay1.text2: Allegria wants to create premium and engaging content for brands and influencers, using simple codes borrowed from the luxury industry in order to refresh sponsored contents.

horizontalDisplay2.text1: The prescribing voices, whether youTubers, Instagramers, experts or celebrities, is now a must-have marketing tool. Yet, they are rarely consulted when developing the Influence marketing operations’ briefs...
horizontalDisplay2.text2: Allegria wants to place influencers at the center of the strategic and creative process of brand campaigns. Highly aware of their audience needs and desires, their opinion is valuable. With their involvement, collaborations will be definitely more successful!

verticalDisplay.text1.1: At Allegria, we like to make beautiful encounters, which is why we prefer human relationships
verticalDisplay.text2: Rather than signing many influencers in exclusivity or using plaxorms to connect brands and influencers through computers, sometimes leading to incoherent encounters, Allegria is commiWed to offer a taylored casting, with reliable talents that we personally know, so we can guarantee their seriousness and commitment.
